import React from 'react' import '../styles/coin.css' import curmap from '../JSON/cur.json' const coin = ({ icon, coinName, symbol, price, volume, priceChange24, marketcap, cur }) => { return (

{coinName}

{symbol.toLocaleString().toUpperCase()}

{curmap.usd}{price}

{curD}{volume.toLocaleString()}

{priceChange24 < 0 ? (

{priceChange24.toFixed(2)}%

) : (

{priceChange24.toFixed(2)}%

)}

{curD}{marketcap.toLocaleString()}

) } export default coin
